General.title: Curriculum vitae
General.description: Explore my CV to find detailed information about my education and work experience. This section highlights my qualifications and achievements, showcasing my journey as a frontend developer.

Details.variousProgrammingLanguages: Insight into various programming languages and techniques
Details.bachelorTitle: Bachelor thesis (in German): Development of a concept for the step-by-step migration of fast-moving Javascript frameworks using the example of Dojo and React

Details.specializing: Specialization in various topics. Lots of practical tasks
Details.masterTitle: Master thesis (in English): Concept and test development for distributed transactions in microservice architectures

Details.scrumTeam: Part of a Scrum team developing a software for banks
Details.infrastructureScripting: Development of CI/CD scripts with Python and Jenkins
Details.javaFeatureDevelopment: Development of features on the server with Java 8
Details.frontendDevelopment: Development of features on the client with JavaScript and Dojo v1 (framework)

Details.scrumTeam: Part of various Scrum teams for the development of applications for banks
Details.onboarding: Onboarding of new Interns and Frontend Developers
Details.frontendDev: Frontend Development with Dojo v1 and later React

Details.scrumTeam: Part of a Scrum team for the development of an e-commerce store
Details.frontendDev: Development of frontend and backend features with NextJs, React and Typescript
Details.onboardingAndPair: Onboarding new employees and pair programming to support other developers
Details.projectLead: Handling asynchronous tasks such as the coordination and evaluation of new monitoring tools

Details.previousResponsibilities: All responsibilities of the Frontend Developer
Details.interTeamCommunication: Representative for the team in communication with other technical teams in the company
Details.frontendOrga: Establishment of a company wide front-end organization for more efficient and direct exchange

Details.previousResponsibilities: All responsibilities of the Frontend Developer and Solution Architect (only less)
Details.technicalResponsibility: Technical responsibility for the product (code quality, architecture, ...)
Details.poForTechnicalStories: Creation, management and prioritization of technical stories for the team
Details.technicalSparringPartner: Technical contact for product owners and other departments as well as companies
